name: Tilapia and Avocado Salad
author: Dolores Rush
summary: This is similar to baccala salad which Italians make as part of the Feast of Seven Fishes on Christmas Eve. Drizzle EVOO over salad before serving. Can be served on a bed of chopped lettuce or with crackers.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed
1 pound tilapia, cut into bite-size cubes
directions: Mix olive oil, lemon zest, lemon juice, garlic, dill, salt, and pepper together in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir tilapia in the oil mixture until opaque, about 10 minutes
Transfer tilapia to a bowl and refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes
Combine chilled tilapia, celery, avocado, tomato, olives, jalapeno peppers, and capers in a bowl
Drizzle reserved olive oil-lemon mixture over tilapia mixture; toss to coat
Allow salad to marinate in the refrigerator, at least 30 minutes
